item.description: No waterskiing. Meet at Peter's place in Newton at ~4:00 PM Drive just a few minutes to the Charles River boat ramp near the Newton/Watertown line. Bring some food and beverage and watch the fireworks from 8-10PM, right in the Charles River. We will anchor/raft up somewhere near the Hatch Shell and the fireworks barge. It will be a late night. We may not get back due to river traffic until very late.Â  If we have enough people we may be able to line up more boats to if we fill up use the wait-list.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at my house, then it is just a few minutes to the ramp on the Charles in Newton.
item.name: Cruise the Charles River to the Hatch Shell Fireworks
